detail_desc: T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Sleeveless nursing dress in chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frill trims at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Leather biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with concealed press-studs. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Viscose lining.

Soft, non-wired bra in satin with lace details, embroidery and triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, decorative tab and button on one shoulder and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft cotton jersey bodysuits in different designs with long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a slight sheen, with a draped neckline, adjustable spaghetti straps and slits in the sides. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is recycled.
Nylon windbreaker with a stand-up collar, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.

Calf-length dress in a linen and cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, a regular waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Long chiffon dress with a lace bodice. Wide neckline, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Fully lined with support panels at the top.
Socks in soft, fine-knit cotton with elasticated tops.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves, narrow cuffs with ties, and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered yoke. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, narrow, gathered cuffs with a button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jersey top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves.

Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fitted dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Knee-length shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt leg pockets and a back pocket.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Dress in a cotton weave with sewn-on pompoms on the front, buttons at the back and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Flared skirt with gathers at the top and patch pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in crinkled, patterned jersey with a round neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Soft inner top with functional fasteners for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem.
Brazilian briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jersey body with a mesh yoke, beaded embroidery, long sleeves and a lined gusset with press-studs.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched all-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and plastic beading at the front.
Sandals in shimmering metallic leather with crossover straps at the front. Suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Cotton slippers with elastication around the opening, terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Marled joggers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Wide waistband for a more comfortable fit.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover with decorative buttons and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hi-tops with a pile-lined inside, lightly padded edge and tongue, fixed lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back.
Knee-high football socks in fine-knit, fast-drying functional yarn with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit.
Calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover at the bust for a gentle draped effect. Gentle flare at the hem. Unlined.
Long coat in soft satin with a shawl collar, front pockets, a tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.

LIMITED EDITION. Long, wide-fitting kaftan in a patterned viscose weave with a grandad collar. Opening at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, 3/4-length sleeves and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Satin playsuit with a lace-trimmed V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Small scarf in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and mulberry silk blend. Size 55x55 cm.

Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a gathered seam at the top, and pleats on one shoulder and at one side to create a draped effect at the front. Seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined over the bust.
Shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather with rows of fringing, a zip at the top and a narrow, braided shoulder strap. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif on the front, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Shirt in an airy, slub cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Blouse in an airy weave with a flounce at the front, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap at the top, flap with a twist lock metal fastener, and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x16x20 cm.
